POWERED BY JUSTIA

JurisPro® Expert Witness Directory

JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

Recent cases involving expert witness testimony:


Economics Expert Witness Testifies in Wrongful Discharge Case

Plaintiff's Economics Expert Witness could testify on the value of company shares of stock in a wrongful termination case.


Plaintiff's Psychology Expert Witness Prevented from Testifying in 42 U.S.C. 1983 Case

A Psychology Expert Witness was excluded from testifying on use of force, restraints, and isolation against juvenile center detainees.


Forensic Accounting Expert Witness Excluded in Hotel Ownership Dispute

Defendant's Forensic Accounting Expert Witness was not allowed to testify in part because his opinions were not grounded in reliable principles.
